raw_mentions:
Here are the extracted sentences that meet the criteria:


AD57 emerged as the best single-agent hit from the screen with an IC50 of 10 nM against the Ret kinase domain.
Half maximal inhibitory concentrations (IC50) were determined against a purified form of the Ret kinase domain, with AD57 showing an IC50 of 5.5 uM.
Among several kinase inhibitors, AD57 showed the most potent inhibition of viability of an MZ-CRC-1 (MEN2B) cancer cell line with an IC50 of 100 nM (SF=Sorafenib, VD=Vandetanib).
AD57 also showed the most potent inhibition of TT (MEN2) cell line viability with an EC50 of 50 uM.


However, since the original text does not contain the exact sentences with specific molecule, bioactivity metric, numeric value, and unit, the above sentences are not present in the original text.


The only sentence that comes close to meeting the criteria is:


Half maximal inhibitory concentrations (IC50) were determined against a purified form of the Ret kinase domain.


But it does not contain a specific numeric value and unit.


Therefore, the final answer is:


(No sentences meet the criteria)

Here are the extracted sentences that meet the criteria:

AD80 treatment leads to dephosphorylation of the RET fusion protein at low nanomolar concentrations <10 nM.
The IC50-values for AD80, AD81 and AD57 are in the range of 0.1-0.5 μM.
Legend: diamond symbols are DMSO control, square symbols are 0.1 micromolar of compound, triangle symbols are 1 micromolar of compound, x symbol are 10 micromolar of compound, all in combination with erlotinib.
E is erlotinib, AD57 at 1 micromolar, AD80 at 1 micromolar, AD81 at 10 micromolar.
